statements: SELECT * FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date, alert_type, user_id FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, alert_type, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts GROUP BY user_id, alert_type HAVING avg_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND alert_type = 'High Risk' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts WHERE alert_type IN ('Fraudulent', 'Illegal') ORDER BY transaction_id ASC
SELECT transaction_id, alert_type FROM unusual_financial_transactions_alerts WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY alert_type ASC
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Priority';
SELECT alert_message, alert_type FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_type DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT account_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical'
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High' ORDER BY alert_id DESC
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Warning' AND alert_message LIKE '%fraud%'
SELECT a.alert_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM alerts AS a JOIN transactions AS t ON a.transaction_id = t.transaction_id
SELECT alert_type, COUNT(*) FROM alerts GROUP BY alert_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM alerts JOIN customers ON alerts.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customers.customer_name, transactions.transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_transactions > 10;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, created_at FROM alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'completed'
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'savings'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'warning' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'important';
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT u.username, a.account_balance FROM users u JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.account_id;
SELECT * FROM alerts
SELECT alert_description, alert_time FROM alerts
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_phone = '+1234567890'
SELECT user_id, notification_message, notification_time FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_time DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_phone = '+123456789';
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_phone FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_phone FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.user_name, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_type FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
